verses.verse: You <S%G154>ask,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2983>receive,<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> with wrong <S%G2560>motives,<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G1159>spend<s%> it <S%G1722>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2237>pleasures.<s%>

You <S%G3432>adulterers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3428>adulteresses,<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>you<s%> know <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5373>friendship<s%> with the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2189>enmity<s%> with <S%G2316>God?<s%> <S%G3739%G99999>Whoever<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1014>wants<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2525>makes<s%> himself an <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
Be <S%G5293>subject<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%> But <S%G436>resist<s%> the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he will <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%>

Draw <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he will draw <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G2511>Cleanse<s%> your <S%G5495>hands,<s%> you <S%G268>sinners;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G48>purify<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> you <S%G1374>double-minded.<s%>
Humble <S%G5013>yourselves<s%> in the sight <S%G1799>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he will <S%G5312>exalt<s%> <S%G5312><s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

<S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G2635>speak<s%> <S%G2635>against<s%> one <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%> He <S%G3588>who<s%> speaks <S%G2635>against<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2919>judges<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> speaks <S%G2635>against<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2919>judges<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G4163>doer<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> a <S%G2923>judge.<s%>

Only <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3550>lawgiver,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G622>destroy.<s%> But <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2087>another?<s%>

<S%G3748>Whereas<s%> you <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1987>know<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> your life will be like <S%G839>tomorrow.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2222>life?<s%> For you <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G1063>a<s%> <S%G822>vapor,<s%> that <S%G5316>appears<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> a little <S%G3641>time,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> vanishes <S%G853>away.<s%>

<S%G473>For<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> ought to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>wills,<s%> we will both <S%G2198>live,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1565>that.<s%>"

To him <S%G3767>therefore<s%> who <S%G1492>knows<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>doesn't<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> to him it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>
